problem_text_cn: 如图,在⊙A中,已知弦BC=8,DE=6,∠BAC+∠EAD=180°,则⊙A的半径长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙A, the known chord BC = N_0, DE = N_1, ∠BAC + ∠EAD = N_2, then the radius of ⊙A is ()
raw_answer:
解:作直径CF,连结BF,如图,∵∠BAC+∠EAD=180°,
而∠BAC+∠BAF=180°,∴∠DAE=∠BAF,∴⁀{DE}=⁀{BF},∴DE=BF=6,∵CF是直径,∴∠CBF=90°,∴CF=√{BC^{2}+BF^{2}}=√{8^{2}+6^{2}}=10．∴⊙A的半径为5．
故选:C．
raw_comment: 此题考查了圆周角定理、垂径定理、三角形中位线的性质以及勾股定理．注意掌握辅助线的作法．
